title: Tree Magic
description: (To watch a video of Harriet introducing Tree Magic, go to: https://www.facebook.com/pg/HarriSpri... )Rainbow’s magic hands can shape trees at her will, but her gift is dangerous and has fatal consequences.From England to France, through secrets, fears and parallel worlds, Rainbow’s journey to understand her powers takes her beyond everything she’s ever known.To find the truth, she must also find herself.
author: Harriet Springbett
